snippet: As many as 10 insurgents wearing police uniforms and suicide vests stormed the police and intelligence buildings in Gereshk District, battling for over 10 hours before being killed.
abstract: Afghan officials say government buildings in Helmand Province were stormed by Taliban attackers, who then fought off security forces for over ten hours before being killed.

byline.original: By MUJIB MASHAL and TAIMOOR SHAH
byline.contributor: Mujib Mashal reported from Kabul, and Taimoor Shah from Kandahar, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: As many as 10 insurgents wearing police uniforms and suicide vests stormed the police and intelligence buildings in Gereshk District, battling for over 10 hours before being killed.

headline.main: Taliban Fighters Assault Afghan Government Sites in Helmand
headline.print_headline: Taliban Attack Police Offices in Helmand
